landing.tagline: Software engineer focused on developing complete technological solutions, with experience in the design, construction and improvement of web applications focused on business process management.

dashboard.profile: I am a software engineer with an integral focus: I don't just develop code, I participate in the entire product cycle, from analysis and design to deployment and continuous improvement. I have worked with technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, Angular, relational databases, and Docker, and I have experience in agile methodologies. I am characterized by responsibility, autonomy, and the ability to understand the business to build solutions that truly provide value.

education.title: Software Engineer
education.description: Comprehensive training at the University of the Armed Forces ESPE, focused on software development, systems architecture, data management and application of agile methodologies to deliver scalable technological solutions.

1.summary: Analysis and development of the enterprise system for managing and administering benefit requests, such as trusts, and others that the client offers to its collaborators.

2.summary: Frontend developer of the enterprise system, implementation and development of modules. Development tools such as PostgreSQL, Angular, and AxureRp were used for prototyping. A web application was developed to support clients via WhatsApp API.

3.summary: Support and development of subsystems and independent modules for the Corporaci√≥n Favorita system.

4.summary: Backend developer in charge of supporting the clients' ERP and generating reports.

5.summary: Fullstack developer in charge of supporting the system (Payment platform) and implementing new system requirements.

courses.description: Below, I share a list of training courses that I have carried out self-taught, with the purpose of continuing to grow professionally and better face the challenges of my work experience. Although they do not have formal certification, they have contributed significantly to my performance and the results obtained.

1.title: Docker
1.description: Principles of containerization, key components to optimize development and deployment of software applications.

2.title: Microfrontends with Angular
2.description: Fundamentals of monolithic microarchitecture for SPA applications, advantages and disadvantages for designing microfronts with Angular.

3.title: Requirements Analysis
3.description: Creation of effective information gathering strategies through requirement elicitation techniques, classifying it according to its importance through classification matrices and modeling the business through four views to identify opportunities for the software.

4.title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
4.description: Preparation for the Az-900 Microsoft Azure Fundamentals exam.

5.title: TDD (Java)
5.description: Test-driven coding practices in Java using progressive examples to understand TDD principles.

6.title: Unit testing in Angular
6.description: Implementation of unit tests in Angular to improve code quality and facilitate maintenance.

7.title: UX / UI Fundamentals
7.description: Psychological principles and practical tips for user experience to develop friendly, striking and functional applications that capture the attention of the end user.

8.title: Flexbox and CSS Grid
8.description: Practical course on Flexbox and CSS Grid.

9.title: AWS CloudFormation
9.description: Introduction to infrastructure as code, AWS CloudFormation is an AWS service that allows provisioning and managing AWS resources using templates.

10.title: Blockchain
10.description: Practical course and fundamentals for building a Blockchain Cryptocurrency and Smart Contracts.

11.title: UX / UI Design
11.description: User experience for developing friendly, striking and functional applications that capture the attention of the end user.

12.title: Programming Logic
12.description: 2.5h practical course on programming logic that allows having the ability to program in any programming language.

administration.title: Request Administration and Management System
administration.desc: of corporate benefits and employee trusts, systematizing status flows, documentation, and controlling status changes.

factoring.title: Factoring System
factoring.desc: Financial tool to streamline liquidity processes through digital management of invoices and collections.

whatsapp.title: Opcionauto WhatsApp Business Enterprise Module
whatsapp.desc: Module integrated into business platforms to optimize efficiency and company service to its clients through personalized real-time information.

records.title: Clinical Records Management System
records.desc: Comprehensive platform for managing information from various medical areas of patients to consolidate electronic medical records (EMR), under medical standards.

crops.title: Crop Management and Monitoring System
crops.desc: Advanced technological solution for real-time tracking and optimization of agricultural resources.
